channel.title: CVE Feed for Form Plugin Team - GhozyLab -- Easy Contact Form Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Form Plugin Team - GhozyLab -- Easy Contact Form Lite

item.title: CVE-2024-32147|2024-08-08T16:12:07.605Z -- form%20plugin%20team%20-%20ghozylab -- easy%20contact%20form%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Form Plugin Team - GhozyLab Easy Contact Form Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Contact Form Lite : from n/a through 1.1.23.
